title: How to Grow Rosecoco Beans: A Step-by-Step Guide | Beans Farming in Kenya 2025

subtasks: Identify suitable crops for low capital investment
Understand market demand for rose cocoa beans
Minimize costs by selecting appropriate planting locations
Apply proper planting techniques (e.g., hole vs. furrow)
Apply fertilizer and manage soil fertility
Manage pests such as aphids with insecticides
Balance leaf and pod development for optimal yield
Harvest and sell rose cocoa beans for competitive prices
